channel.title: People on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in People on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: For Me, It’s About the People
item.description: After the second day of this conference, thinking about why I’ve had such a great experience, and why I find myself so connected to this world that a few days ago I was anything but, the answer is clear. Ultimately, for me, it matters more who you are, and how you do something, than what you are actually doing.
